main event: Witnesses at the Phillips Petroleum Plant in Albuquerque, New Mexico reported observing an unidentified flying object that was very bright and hovering approximately 50 feet above the ground.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 10 to 15 feet in diameter,The object moved slowly along the perimeter of the plant before accelerating away,Another similar object was also reported in the area by a different witness,The sighting occurred on July 8, 1962, at around 9:00 PM,Investigation of the reports is ongoing.
witness description: witnesses from the Phillips Petroleum Plant
